> [gitcenter](#comment_181_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Reply

Thank you guys you got it to work! Though for some reason the editor I was using the make the code more readable didn't have two of those "top.isRemotePresenter" uses. The help was much appreciated!

So to sum up the solution for anyone using Xara Web Designer and Zeronet:

Add the following after your pages <head> tag:
<base href="" target="_top" id="base">
<script>base.href = document.location.href.replace("/media", "").replace("index.html", "").replace(/[&?]wrapper=False/, "").replace(/[&?]wrapper_nonce=[A-Za-z0-9]+/, "")</script>

and go into 'index_html_files\roe.js' and change all (should be at least two) 'top.isRemotePresenter' entries to 'false'

Thank you to Krixano and Gitcenter for spending this time working on this with me!
